answers.transcript: My name is Alex, I'm from Bangkok and I am a 33 year old student and I like to watch movies.
answers.improvedTranscript: My name is [Name], I am from Bangkok, I am a 33-year-old student, and I like to watch movies.

feedback.feedback: Great job! You conveyed most of the information accurately and clearly. Just a couple of minor points to note regarding punctuation.
suggestions: Consider using commas before 'and' to enhance clarity in longer sentences.
Make sure to maintain consistency in formatting numbers, such as using hyphens in '33-year-old'.

transcripts.prompt-0: My family have a lot people good.
transcripts.prompt-3: My father like to go to the farm?

answers.improvedTranscript: My family has many good people. My mother is a farmer. My sister has a car. My father enjoys going to the farm. AI is my favorite subject.

answers.transcript: My family has many good people. My mother is farmer. My sister has a car. My father enjoy going to the farm. AI is fabulous subject.
answers.improvedTranscript: My family has many good people. My mother is a farmer. My sister has a car. My father enjoys going to the farm. AI is my favorite subject.

feedback.feedback: Great job! You conveyed the main ideas clearly, but there are a few areas for improvement. Keep practicing your sentence structure and word choices to enhance your fluency.
suggestions: Add 'a' before 'farmer' to make it grammatically correct.
Change 'enjoy' to 'enjoys' to match the subject 'my father'.
Replace 'fabulous' with 'favorite' to match the target text.

feedback.feedback: Great job on your reading! You maintained the overall flow and most of the content. However, there were a couple of minor errors in word choice that affected the meaning slightly. Keep practicing attention to detail in your word selection.
suggestions: Focus on the correct usage of words like 'planned' instead of 'planning'.
Practice reading aloud to improve clarity and accuracy.
Work on pausing appropriately to enhance comprehension and fluency.
